Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jefferson/Jackson
ShortDescription: Eastbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal: due to, a festival near Jefferson/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Halsted, Monroe and Canal: due to, a festival near Jefferson/Jackson.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
